articles.title: Chicago shooting: 6 killed in Highland Park July 4 parade massacre; 22-year-old 'person of interest' arrested - Times Now
articles.description: The July 4 shooting is just the latest in a series of incidents that have shaken American society. According to the Gun Violence Archive website, firearms cause approximately 40,000 deaths per year in the United States, including suicides.
